name: Death's Palace
description:
[WARNING] Epic Gamers Only Description Story:

Souls/Ghosts hate Death(The Grim Reaper) for collecting them... The ghosts have decided! They will be marching up to Death's fortress to destroy it as revenge!  

How to play:

Play as Death and collect ghosts to keep them from destroying the palace... but be careful, Death is not, a luxury, everyone can afford...

Controls:

-  Left click and hold to drag ghosts into containers to stop them

- Click "R" to repair it (Needs 50 gold)

Team & Credits
  • @Onew4y - The programming of the game, Music, Sound effects
  • @ShotgunFlamez(Me) - The programming of the game, Art
Note:

This game is a submission to the  BattleCat Game Jam #1
